title: Why should we be forced to play with and against stacks when we don't want to?
body: Seriously, why should we? This is the one thing that manages to suck the most fun out of games.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=T2ufKEEa,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-02-11T04:25:12.173+0000)
>
> {{champion:75}}  STACKS?

Whoah that's like, really funny yeah? You is like, a really funny geezer and all that other shit. You should do like standing up comedy and all that because you is obviously really shit, uh, I mean, good at it. Other thing you could be cause doctor is saying this always is you could be bent well up. You could be a real bender and if that is true don't touch me with your hands they have anal on them.

> [{quoted}](name=Anatera,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=T2ufKEEa,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-02-11T04:41:26.282+0000)
>
> Whoah that's like, really funny yeah? You is like, a really funny geezer and all that other shit. You should do like standing up comedy and all that because you is obviously really shit, uh, I mean, good at it. Other thing you could be cause doctor is saying this always is you could be bent well up. You could be a real bender and if that is true don't touch me with your hands they have anal on them.

Really,i have no idea what the fuck this post is about. What are 'stacks'? Is this region-specific slang/terminology for a premade?

>  Other thing you could be cause doctor is saying this always is you could be bent well up.

Has Anyone Really Been Far Even as Decided to Use Even Go Want to do Look More Like?

My problem with it is you can't leave that champion alone.

Don't tell me otherwise. You are asking to lose the game later.

It's about as bad as allowing a split pusher to split push without them actually split pushing.

They get to pressure...

With just farming alone.

> [{quoted}](name=Lakrosin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=T2ufKEEa,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-02-11T04:44:35.354+0000)
>
> My problem with it is you can't leave that champion alone.
> 
> Don't tell me otherwise. You are asking to lose the game later.

You is like also a real geezer, yeah? But like, super deep and shit. I had this one bender who told me to get down on my knees and I was all like, "no way, you isn't my dad" and he was gonna wax all philo to get me and so he like did and then I like did.
I think Stacking is an ok mechanic, that is appropriately left on a small number of champions. It exists I'm a niche, get over it.
